review_data.title: Great sports pub.
review_data.content: Have been in here a few times visiting family in Zurich. Lovely food and great to watch the football on their numerous T.V screens. Staff was lovely and friendly. Not cheap but your in Zurich.

review_data.title: Night out

review_data.title: Oktoberfest in an Irish Pub ;)
review_data.content: Typical Irish pub that in occasion of Munich Oktoberfest has proposed special offers for beer and bretzel. I tasted a salad with black paddy (irish sausage) and apples. Very nice. Wide proposal of beers.

review_data.title: Back on my list of top 3 Zurich pubs

review_data.title: Cold Beer

review_data.title: Great fish & chips

review_data.title: Nice location, not so good staff

review_data.title: Nothing special

review_data.title: Go for drinks, avoid the food...

review_data.title: Stale chips
review_data.content: Food was terrible, chips were reheated stale hard. Thai Curry was disgusting, tasted like it was made from sour cream rater than cocnut milk. would not recommend to eat here.

review_data.title: A bit of Ireland in Zurich

review_data.title: Good place for hanging out with friends and concerts

review_data.title: Hasn't changed
